SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.connection

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.connection.SmtpFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.connection.Connection
public class Connection extends SmtpFoundation
Connection controller.

This is the single object that passes through all the implementations of the extensions used in a receipt or delivery.

See Also:
  • EmailDelivery
  • EmailReceipt
